messages.title: We are living in difficult times – fortunately I'm always ready for a challenge.
messages.content: Orkney and Shetland needs an MP that will stand up for local people.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Lifting the national minimum wage to £10 an hour
keyPolicies.policyDescription: I will tackle inequalities and make sure that all employees can expect a fair day's pay for a fair day's work.
I will oppose a hard Brexit and work tirelessly to ensure that our fishing and farming communities don't lose out.
I will fight for a universal service free at the point of need to secure the future of our National Health Service.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Being a strong voice for women
keyPolicies.policyDescription: I will stand up for women's rights and ensure gender equality in all areas of society.
I will do all I can to protect and tackle the causes and effects of climate change.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Tories and SNP have held working families back.

issues.brexitEurope: I will oppose a hard Brexit and work tirelessly to ensure that our fishing and farming communities don't lose out.
issues.environment: I will do all I can to protect and tackle the causes and effects of climate change.
issues.health: I will fight for a universal service free at the point of need to secure the future of our National Health Service.
issues.labourEmployment: I will tackle inequalities and make sure that all employees can expect a fair day's pay for a fair day's work.

community.content: We can take real pride in our islands with their unique natural and cultural heritage, but securing a sustainable future is a challenge. I will fight for the affordable reliable transport services and digital connectivity that we need to thrive.

leaflet.personalStatement: I'm standing because Orkney and Shetland needs a strong local voice.

politicalExperience.role: Labour candidate for Orkney and Shetland

quotes.text: Inequality is unacceptable in a modern society. On 8 June, families in Orkney and Shetland can choose between a Labour government that stands up for the many, or the Tories who only look after a privileged few.

examples: Inequality is unacceptable in a modern society.
I'm standing because Orkney and Shetland needs a strong local voice.
We can take real pride in our islands with their unique natural and cultural heritage, but securing a sustainable future is a challenge.
Orkney and Shetland needs an MP that will stand up for local people.
I will fight for a universal service free at the point of need to secure the future of our National Health Service.
I will do all I can to protect and tackle the causes and effects of climate change.
I will stand up for women's rights and ensure gender equality in all areas of society.
I will oppose a hard Brexit and work tirelessly to ensure that our fishing and farming communities don't lose out.
I will tackle inequalities and make sure that all employees can expect a fair day's pay for a fair day's work.

personalStories.story: Working together is a core Labour value, and it's a value that is close to my heart. With solidarity, imagination, and tenacity we can secure a better future for our islands and our country.

examples: While the Tories give the super-rich tax breaks, working families are worse off. And the SNP has passed on Tory austerity while it focuses on plans for a divisive second independence referendum.
The Tories and the SNP are holding working families back.

nonPolicyAttributes.localness: I will fight for the affordable reliable transport services and digital connectivity that we need to thrive.

examples: I'm standing because Orkney and Shetland needs a strong local voice.
